comments:
On M5 RC1 build.

(Similar to bug47540, perhaps dependent on it,
but different stack trace.)

1. Turn off Build on Resource Save preference.
2. Create a new C++ StandardMake project
3. Create a new Class within that project
4. Search for all class declarations named "*" within workspace.

A dialog box "Search Error" appears:
An error occurred during the Search operation.
See error log for more details

ECLIPSE_HOME/workspace/.metadata/.log contains:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.search 4 1 Nov 26, 2003 10:45:43.351

Bogdan, did you actually fix it, or is this a latent bug?

No longer a valid bug as all of the search UI has been replaced with new 
search UI. Wasn't able to repro with new UI using 12 build + latest in head on 
Linux.

- BG
